body.p: Using a file explorer, go to the frameworks directory. Select the sdf directory and make an archive from it. Move it to another installation (eventually on another computer). Extract it in the frameworks directory. Start and test the association as explained above.

If you create multiple document type associations and you have a complex directory structure it might be easy from the deployment point of view to use an All Platforms distribution. Add your framework files to it, repackage it and send it to the content authors.

note.p: When deploying your customized sdf directory please make sure that your sdf directory contains the sdf.framework file (that is the file defined as External Storage in Document Type Association dialog shall always be stored inside the sdf directory). If your external storage points somewhere else will not be able to update the Document Type Association options automatically on the deployed computers.
